thread.title: Emmerdale spoilers: Rakesh is battered and taken hostage by a mystery attacker
thread.title_full: Emmerdale spoilers: Rakesh is battered and taken hostage by a mystery attacker

author: Neil Batey
title: Emmerdale spoilers: Rakesh is battered and taken hostage by a mystery attacker
text:
Terrified Rakesh is attacked, abducted and tied to a chair (Photo: ITV) Share Get soaps   Thank you for subscribing!   
Rakesh is battered over the head and kidnapped by a mystery attacker – and the list of suspects in Emmerdale is as long as his tally of debts. 
This week in the ITV soap, Priya has ill-advisedly decided to take her cash-strapped hubby back, even though he embezzled funds from her and cheated with Chrissie. 
When they go public at the Woolpack, few villagers congratulate them on rekindling their love. 
Later, when Rakesh tells David about his job offer in Manila, Jimmy throws a spanner in the works by revealing that Rakesh started the fire at Mill Cottage. David now has ammunition to stop the arsonist taking Amba abroad with him. Bound and gagged, terrified Rakesh wonders who has abducted him (Photo: ITV) 
Soon afterwards, someone assaults and abducts Rakesh. The failed businessman wakes up gagged and tied to a chair. 
But who is the attacker? Jai is furious that Rakesh and Priya are back together, Jimmy still has an axe to grind and David doesn’t want him to leave. Frankly, it’s anyone’s guess! She's on to Ron Tradesman Ronnie is accused of theft by Chrissie 
When village builder Ronnie starts to act suspiciously, Chrissie shops him to the police. 
First, she spots him handing over an envelope to a mystery man on CCTV, which she shows to Charity. Then Lawrence reveals he’s changed his will. 
Later, when a digger goes missing, Chrissie is convinced her dad’s partner is up to something. She calls the cops and they arrive to question Ronnie. 
Will Chrissie be shocked by the truth? Aaron's a doomed groom Robert tries to cheer up miserable Aaron during a prison visiting session (Photo: ITV) Read More Emmerdale fans in tears as Aaron Dingle and Robert Sugden finally get married... in a garage 
A few days ago Aaron was looking forward to marrying Robert. Now he’s in prison and in fear of his life. 
Sent to jail for assaulting Kasim, the moody mechanic is having a miserable time in the cells, where he’s being menaced by thugs. Aaron is menaced by a violent thug in his prison cell (Photo: ITV) 
Chas is concerned for her son when she visits him and Robert finds it hard to hide his true emotions too. Will the inmates spot an intimate moment between them? 
Later, a prison thug learns that Aaron is paedophile Gordon’s son. Uh-oh – that’s not going to endear him to his new convict mates.
